data.title: Radio Mirchi 98.3 Tamil FM 24X7 Live from Chennai
data.meta_description: Radio Mirchi is a nation wide FM radio broadcaster airing in many languages including Tamil in Chennai and other cities in Tamilnadu. 98.3 is the terrestrial frequency of the radio.
data.text:
About Radio Mirchi 98.3

Radio Mirchi is a nationwide network of private FM radio stations in India. It is owned by the EntertainmentNetwork India Ltd (ENIL), which is one of the subsidiaries of The Times Group. mirchi is Hindi for Red Chilli. The tagline of Radio Mirchi Tamil is "Radio Mirchi Sema Hot Machi" ("Radio Mirchi is too hot"). It is the first privately owned radio station in India. Radio Mirchi maintains weekly music charts (or record charts) for Tamil Music. The most followed charts are Mirchi Top 20 (Tamil Songs) and Angrezi Top 20 (English Songs). Both of these charts are a ranking of recorded music according to popularity.

Genre: pop, bollywood, indian music.

First Broadcast date: 2001

Bitrate: 128 Kbps

Frequency: 98.3 FM

Country: India

State: Maharashtra

City: Mumbai

Address: ENIL, Radio Mirchi, Matulya Centre, 4th floor, Senapati Bapat Marg, Lower Parel (W), Mumbai 400013

Email: [email protected]

Phone number: 022 - 66620600
